notes.title: Paying Attention to When We Kept on Living
notes.description: How does our perception of mortality change when we focus on lives saved? What are the long-term implications of preventive measures on public health?

notes.title: One Trillion Dollar Increase in the Wealth of the Richest Families
notes.description: How does the growth in wealth of the richest families compare with the income of average workers? What are the implications of this concentration of wealth for society?

notes.title: The Revolution in Organ Transplants Thanks to Gene Editing
notes.description: How is genetic modification transforming the field of organ transplants? What are the clinical outcomes of implanting a genetically modified pig kidney into a human?

notes.title: China's Battery Giant Eyes World Domination
notes.description: What is CATL's R&D investment strategy compared with its competitors? How does China's leadership in the battery supply chain affect the global market?
